thread.section_title: Citadines South Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: will come again
thread.title_full: will come again - Review of Citadines South Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Chi Wah James L
title: will come again
text:
This is my first stay at Citadines. The reason why I choose this apartment for its convenient location.
I arrived London early in the morning after flying long haul. The staff are very helpful and kind in offering me early check-in, so that I can refresh & relax in the room.
Except weak water of shower head, and the curtain not big enough to prevent morning sunlight, The room is clean & tidy with sufficient utensil. In general, I had a pleasant stay.
